name: Endless Furry Clicker
description:
Welcome to Endless Furry Clicker!
The third installment of the "Endless Furry" Series!

Key Features:
1. Clicking to gain Furrs!
2. Click upgrades, increases the Furrs per click!
3. Furr Grinder, increases the Furrs per second!
4. Unlock Music and More!
5. Hidden Easter Eggs!
6. Endless clicking! Break your expensive gaming mouse. (Or just use a auto clicking macro)
7. Play AFK! Let the Furr Grinder collect Furr in your sleep!
8. Consistent bug fixes and patches!
